titles.title: A resolution congratulating the National Active and Retired Federal Employees Association on the celebration of its 100th anniversary on February 19, 2021, and recognizing the vital contributions its members have made to the United States over the past 100 years.

A resolution congratulating the National Active and Retired Federal Employees Association on the celebration of its 100th anniversary on February 19, 2021, and recognizing the vital contributions its members have made to the United States over the past 100 years.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates and honors the National Active and Retired Federal Employees Association on the celebration of its 100th anniversary.
